profile_seo_title: My Account - Stocknear | Manage Your Profile, Password, Subscriptions & Notifications
profile_seo_description: Easily manage your profile, change your password, update subscription plans, and customize notifications on Stocknear. Stay in control of your stock analysis and alerts.
profile_discord_description: Gain access to real-time options flow from major institutional players, live dark pool activity, instant earnings updates, market-moving news, and much more â€” all designed to keep you ahead of the market.
profile_push_description: Stay up-to-date with real-time price alerts, the latest stock news, and earnings calls delivered straight to your device.
profile_push_enable_settings: Review your settings and enable notifications to stay updated with Stocknear alerts.
profile_push_install_required: You can activate the push notification only if you downloaded the app.
profile_subscription_renews_on: Your subscription will automatically renew on {date}
profile_subscription_billed_on: Your subscription will automatically billed on {date}
profile_subscription_active_until: Your subscription will remain active until {date}
profile_modal_cancel_description: You will no longer be charged for this subscription, and at the end of the billing period, your account will transfer to the Free Plan.
profile_modal_reactivate_description: Reactivate your Subscription now to unlock unlimited features and gain the edge over the competition.
profile_modal_upgrade_plus_description: You're Account will be upgraded to Plus (Annual Plan). You'll only be charged the difference between your current plan and the new one.
profile_modal_upgrade_pro_description: You're Account will be upgraded to Pro (Annual Plan). You'll only be charged the difference between your current plan and the new one.
profile_install_ios_step1: Tap on the Safari share button.
profile_install_ios_note: Note that web apps on iOS can only be installed using Safari.
profile_install_android_step2: Tap the three-dot menu in the top right.
profile_install_android_step3: Tap "Install app" or "Add to Home screen."
profile_toast_cancel_success: Subscription Cancelled successfully! Please wait a moment...
profile_toast_reactivate_success: Subscription Reactivate successfully! Please wait a moment...
profile_toast_change_plan_success: Changing to Annual Plan successfully! Please wait a moment...
profile_toast_push_deactivate_failed: Failed to deactivate push notifications. Please try again.
profile_toast_push_allow: Please allow notifications in your browser settings
profile_toast_push_activate_failed: Failed to activate push notifications. Please try again or check if your browser supports push notifications.
profile_toast_push_error: An error occurred. Please try again.
profile_toast_premium_pro_only: Premium Access is for Pro Members only.
profile_toast_premium_error: Failed to assign premium access. Please try again later.
